pass your secret and the blockhash from your commit block"},"click(bytes32)":{"params":{"dataHash":"keccak256(abi.encodePacked(secret, salt))"}},"forfeit()":{"details":"The player voluntarily abandons any potential winnings. Their 10K bet stays in the house."},"reveal(bytes32,bytes32)":{"params":{"salt":"Random salt used when committing","secret":"The secret value you committed"}}},"title":"LuckyClick","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"checkWin(bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Check if a secret would win given a specific blockhash"},"click(bytes32)":{"notice":"Place a bet by committing a hash and paying 10K CLAWD"},"computeHash(bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Compute the commitment hash (use this to generate your hash off-chain too)"},"forfeit()":{"notice":"Forfeit your current bet so you can play again immediately."},"getBet(address)":{"notice":"Get a player's current bet info"},"houseBalance()":{"notice":"Get the house balance (available to pay winners)"},"reveal(bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Reveal your secret to claim winnings (only call this if you won!)"}},"notice":"A simple 10-to-1 odds betting game using commit-reveal for fairness. How it works: 1. CLICK: Pay 10,000 CLAWD and submit hash(secret, salt). Tokens go to the contract. 2. CHECK: After 1 block, you can compute locally whether you won.    - winning = (keccak256(secret, commitBlockHash) % 10 == 0) 3. REVEAL (only if you won!): Submit secret + salt on-chain to claim 90,000 CLAWD.    - If you lost, just walk away. No reveal needed. House edge: 10% (1/10 chance \u00d7 90K payout = 9K expected value on a 10K bet) The contract must be funded with CLAWD to pay out winners. Anyone can fund the house by transferring CLAWD to the contract.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/LuckyClick.sol":"LuckyClick"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":ds-test/=lib/solidity-bytes-utils/lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":halmos-cheatcodes/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/halmos-cheatcodes/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/",":solidity-bytes-utils/=lib/solidity-bytes-utils/contracts/"]},"sources":{"contracts/LuckyClick.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2ddeb4e2e8dbeda07d6f2d83d1718066ba1c81404011c7477d0f12a4d7d95205","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3348a21e1e9c063d2451100ee048b128fda705ad79673523230f96cde5feff3f","dweb:/ipfs/QmXLdrQbt95ZnbZew45NxreBHHF41KHafg87QVqNXPo9xG"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC1363.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd5ea07362ab630a6a3dee4285a74cf2377044ca2e4be472755ad64d7c5d4b69d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da5e832b40fc5c3145d3781e2e5fa60ac2052c9d08af7e300dc8ab80c4343100","dweb:/ipfs/QmTzf7N5ZUdh5raqtzbM11yexiUoLC9z3Ws632MCuycq1d"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0afcb7e740d1537b252cb2676f600465ce6938398569f09ba1b9ca240dde2dfc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1c299900ac4ec268d4570ecef0d697a3013cd11a6eb74e295ee3fbc945056037","dweb:/ipfs/Qmab9owJoxcA7vJT5XNayCMaUR1qxqj1NDzzisduwaJMcZ"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1a6221315ce0307746c2c4827c125d821ee796c74a676787762f4778671d4f44","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1bb2332a7ee26dd0b0de9b7fe266749f54820c99ab6a3bcb6f7e6b751d47ee2d","dweb:/ipfs/QmcRWpaBeCYkhy68PR3B4AgD7asuQk7PwkWxrvJbZcikLF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x74ed01eb66b923d0d0cfe3be84604ac04b76482a55f9dd655e1ef4d367f95bc2"," checkWin(bytes32,bytes32).details: Use this client-side: pass your secret and the blockhash from your commit block

forfeit().details: The player voluntarily abandons any potential winnings. Their 10K bet stays in the house.

checkWin(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Check if a secret would win given a specific blockhash

click(bytes32).notice: Place a bet by committing a hash and paying 10K CLAWD

computeHash(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Compute the commitment hash (use this to generate your hash off-chain too)

forfeit().notice: Forfeit your current bet so you can play again immediately.

getBet(address).notice: Get a player's current bet info

houseBalance().notice: Get the house balance (available to pay winners)

reveal(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Reveal your secret to claim winnings (only call this if you won!)
